data.title: Costanzo Preve 2012 2
data.meta_description: costanzo preve 2012 2 - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. CP: globalization is a capitalistic saturation of the whole world: it's a crucial moment in human history. The Greek culture and then the Roman and Medieval Christian culture are internal to the Western world. The impressive success of capitalism in countries like china, india, Thailand, Malaysia, South Korea shows that we are not observing a Calvinist secularisation.
